meanings.sent1: He will butle at the grand party tonight.
meanings.sent2: She butles for a wealthy family in the city.
meanings.sent3: The robot decided to butle for the family, causing chaos in the house.
meanings.sent4: The sun seemed to butle its way through the clouds, shining brightly.
meanings.sent5: The butling of the butler was impeccable, leaving everyone impressed.

meanings.definition: A male servant in charge of a household.
meanings.sent1: The butle managed the household with precision.
meanings.sent2: The wealthy family hired a new butle to help with daily tasks.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought it was the new butle of the house, trying to organize everything.
meanings.sent4: The old butle of the manor was like a guardian, watching over the family with care.
meanings.sent5: The butle's uniform gleamed in the sunlight, a symbol of his dedication to his role.
